short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extended and configurable shortcuts for YouTube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension is deadass simple and is basically a userscript that can be configured by chrome's shortcuts system.

For now it can:
- like/dislike/unlike the video;
- press subscribe button (auto confirm unsubscription as well);
- change notification bell status (all/personalized/none).

Missing a feature? You can create an issue and request it.
See its github page for more info: https://github.com/NFrid/yt-shortcuts
